checklist.Text: Remove Picogreen Kit from fridge, loosen cover.
Let kit contents equilibriate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
Only open lid a crack to protect Picogreen reagent from light.
Don gloves and swab work area with nucleic acid decontaminant.
Wrap 50mL tube with aluminum foil.
Pipette 19.9mL of Picogreen Buffer into foil wrapped tube.
Pipette 100µL of concentrated Picogreen reagent into the foil wrapped tube.
Vortex tube, let bubbles settle.
Pour contents into reservoir.
Cover reservoir with foil.
Tear off a piece of foil sufficient to cover 96-well plate.
Turn plate.
Use 8-channel pipettor to load 185 µL of Picogreen mix into wells in column 1.
Use 8-channel pipettor to load 185 µL of Picogreen mix into wells in column 2.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 3.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 4.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 5.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 6.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 7.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 8.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 9.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 10.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 11.
Load 195 µL of Picrogreen mix into column 12.
Turn plate.
Load 15 µL of Picogreen mix into well A1.
Vortex clear 0 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL clear 0 ng/mL standard into well A2.
Vortex green 5 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL green 5 ng/mL standard into well B1.
Load 15 µL green 5 ng/mL standard into well B2.
Vortex blue 10 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL blue 10 ng/mL standard into well C1.
Load 15 µL blue 10 ng/mL standard into well C2.
Vortex lilac 20 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL lilac 20 ng/mL standard into well D1.
Load 15 µL lilac 20 ng/mL standard into well D2.
Vortex red 40 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL red 40 ng/mL standard into well E1.
Load 15 µL red 40 ng/mL standard into well E2.
Vortex orange 60 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL orange 60 ng/mL standard into well F1.
Load 15 µL orange 60 ng/mL standard into well F2.
Vortex brown 80 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL brown 80 ng/mL standard into well G1.
Load 15 µL brown 80 ng/mL standard into well G2.
Vortex yellow 100 ng/mL tube.
Load 15 µL yellow 100 ng/mL standard into well H1.
Load 15 µL yellow 100 ng/mL standard into well H2.
Remove samples from incubator.
Place tubes in 5 X 10 tube rack on benchtop.
Add 5 µL of sample 1 to well A3.
Add 5 µL of sample 2 to well B3.
Add 5 µL of sample 3 to well C3.
Add 5 µL of sample 4 to well D3.
Add 5 µL of sample 5 to well E3.
Add 5 µL of sample 6 to well F3.
Add 5 µL of sample 7 to well G3.
Add 5 µL of sample 8 to well H3.
Add 5 µL of sample 9 to well A4.
Add 5 µL of sample 10 to well B4.
Add 5 µL of sample 11 to well C4.
Add 5 µL of sample 12 to well D4.
Add 5 µL of sample 13 to well E4.
Add 5 µL of sample 14 to well F4.
Add 5 µL of sample 15 to well G4.
Add 5 µL of sample 16 to well H4.
Cover plate with foil.
